About Me

Hi. I'm Priyam Srivastava also known as VIVACIOUS. I'm an undergraduate student at Jaypee University of Engineering and Technology, India. I like to build websites & web applications. I am interested in making user interface for games, web apps and projects which help improve user and developer productivity. I'm also interested in graphic designing and photography.
